clues.text: Barbara Tuchman's history of the events that led to World War I is called these "of August"

Spoiler alert! A character is murdered & eaten by cannibals in this drama by Tennessee Williams
This memoir by Ron Kovic begins, "The blood is still rolling off my flak jacket from the hole in my shoulder"
Joe Christmas, who doesn't know if he's black or white, is at the center of this Faulkner novel
In this type of wager, you win by selecting the first 3 horses in the exact order of finish in one race
A female horse, age 4 or under; Rags to Riches became the first in 102 years to win the Belmont Stakes in 2007
In 1934 this track opened in its current location in Arcadia, near Los Angeles
Known as "America's turf authority since 1894", it began in Chicago as a 4-page newspaper
In this thoroughbred's "smokin"' career, he won a then-record $9,999,815

rounds.comments: (Alex: And you have to spell the correct response.)

clues.text: This honeybee can lay a thousand or more eggs a day
It's the common name for the big, fuzzy members of the bombini tribe
Honeybees of this industrious caste are all female, but they never reach sexual maturity
This stingless honeybee drudge caste is only around in summer
11-letter "continental," adjective that describes the honeybee hybrid

Skyros Island in this sea

This temple complex 4 miles north of Siem Reap, Cambodia

Philosopher Soren Kierkegaard was born May 5, 1813 in this capital

This May-5 born Monty Python member & BBC travel filmmaker is a commando of the Order of the British Empire
A culinary foundation is named for this dean of American cookery who was born in Portland May 5, 1903
You're nuts if you don't know this title of hits by Seal, Icehouse & Patsy Cline

Robbie Nevil & B*witched had tunes called this French phrase meaning "that's life"

Sticky-sweet title of No. 1s for Bobby Goldsboro in 1968 & Mariah Carey in 1997

16 tablespoons equals one of these

Despite his advocacy of megadoses of vitamin C, he & his wife Ava got cancer

This type of jury charged with deciding whether there's enough evidence to try a person may have up to 23 members
The general type of this military tribunal must have at least 5 members & the defense attorney may be military or civilian

rounds.text: The 1st scene in this book: "With the brass nozzle in his fists, with this great python spitting its venomous kerosene"
